lexUnit.name: pursuit.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: mass noun the action of pursuing.

sentence.text: Soon the Jacobite infantry were in full flight , with William himself leading the pursuit across seven miles [ 11 km ] of countryside , where many stragglers died amid the dykes and hedges , though quarter was , on his order , given to all who asked for it .
